DOC.detailed_description: Topiramate approve treatment obesity . This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study assess safety effectiveness topiramate treatment obese patient . Patients receive 24 week treatment topiramate placebo , follow 2 week taper safety follow-up . Effectiveness determine change baseline week 24 body weight , body mass index ( BMI ) , anthropometric measurement ( waist circumference , hip circumference , waist/hip ration ) , fast lipid profile , fast plasma glucose , HbA1c ( show average blood sugar level month ) , fast uric acid , fast insulin , blood pressure . Safety evaluation ( incidence adverse event , physical examination , 12 lead ECGs , vital sign , Computerized Neuropsychological Test Battery ) perform throughout study . The study hypothesis topiramate effective achieve maintain weight reduction obese patient well tolerate . The patient randomize receive either topiramate ( 64 , 96 , 192 , 384 mg daily ) placebo daily mouth 24 week .
